name: Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzle: Animals 103 Puzzles
description:
103 Puzzles– what great value!
This game showcases a wide variety of animals and is great for animal lovers!

Features:
3 different difficulties with countdown and hints
36 8x8 = 64 pieces
36 16x16 =256 pieces
31 32x32 = 1024 pieces

User friendly User Interface
'Magnetic' puzzle pieces to make life easier
Calming music

What more do you need and at such great value!
